plentry.pd: Type of video stream to subscribe to. Default is VideoStreamHigh, i.e., subscribe to the high-quality video stream. See .

Whether to subscribe only to encoded video streams:
: Subscribe only to encoded video data (structured data); the SDK does not decode or render this video data.
: (Default) Subscribe to both raw and encoded video data.
Type of video stream to subscribe to. Default is VideoStreamHigh, i.e., subscribe to the high-quality video stream. See .

Whether to subscribe only to the encoded video stream:
: Subscribe only to encoded video data (structured data), the SDK does not decode or render the video.
: (Default) Subscribe to both raw and encoded video data.
Type of video stream to subscribe to. Default is videoStreamHigh, which subscribes to the high-quality video stream. See for details.

Whether to subscribe only to encoded video streams:
: Subscribe only to encoded video data (structured data). The SDK does not decode or render the video data.
: (Default) Subscribe to both raw and encoded video data.
Type of video stream to subscribe to. The default value is VIDEO_STREAM_HIGH, which subscribes to the high-quality video stream. See .

Whether to subscribe only to the encoded video stream:
: Subscribe only to encoded video data (structured data). The SDK does not decode or render this video data.
: (Default) Subscribe to both raw and encoded video data.
